name: pipeline-io
description: pipeline engine with outside connectors and manipulation functions

scripts.pkg:linux: PKG_CACHE_PATH=.pkg-cache pkg --config package.json --targets node14-linux-x64 --compress GZip --output .build/pipeline-io index.js
scripts.pkg:windows: PKG_CACHE_PATH=.pkg-cache pkg --targets node14-windows-x64 --compress GZip --output .build/pipeline-io.exe --options max-old-space-size=1024 index.js

author: Ricardo Silva aka kalstong
